definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: This is the Pan-American Club. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 这里是泛美俱乐部。我可以为你服务吗？

sentences.english: And what they do is they simply give the Pan Am smile.
sentences.chinese: 他们通常是泛美式微笑。

sentences.english: The Transamerica Pyramid is visible in the background on Columbus Street.
sentences.chinese: 的泛美金字塔是可见的背景哥伦布街。

sentences.english: But we couldn't even get the Intra - American group to join together in denouncing Castro.
sentences.chinese: 而我们竟连泛美集团的联会谴责都没有实现。

sentences.english: Great names such as Pan Am had disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 许多伟大的名字，像泛美航空，早已消失的无影无踪。

sentences.english: The Pan Americano is the premier rugby competition held in the Americas.
sentences.chinese: 泛美杯是美洲的顶级橄榄球赛事。

sentences.english: It's sometimes known as a "Pan Am" smile.
sentences.chinese: 即泛美航空公司式的微笑。

sentences.english: Northwind Airways, good morning. May I help you?
sentences.chinese: 下午好，泛美航空公司，我能帮您忙吗？

sentences.english: Later, he became a professional photographer for Pan American World Airways.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他成为了泛美航空公司专业的摄影师。

sentences.english: Two of the Pan-American Exposition's buildings were dedicated to electricity.
sentences.chinese: 两个泛美博览会的建筑物，专用的供电问题。

sentences.english: China could not have joined the IADB without US consent.
sentences.chinese: 没有美国的首肯，中国也不可能加入泛美开发银行。

sentences.english: Leyva was also the High Bar champion at the 2008 Pan American Championships in Argentina.
sentences.chinese: 莱瓦还高杆冠军，在2008年泛美锦标赛在阿根廷。

sentences.english: It’s those people back there at the Pan Am, standing in the rain.
sentences.chinese: 那几个在雨中站在泛美油站外的人。

sentences.english: Where is the counter of Pan-American?
They will be automatically transfered to Pan am. Don't worry.
sentences.chinese: 他们自动会换到泛美去，别耽心。

sentences.english: Canada won two gold medals in Thursday's diving tournament at the Pan American Games.
sentences.chinese: 加拿大获得两枚金牌在周四的跳水赛在泛美运动会。

definition: St Louis, large city in eastern Missouri
Korean Air, South Korea's main airline

pinyin: Mei3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1
